#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define mod 1000000007
class matrix
{
	ll rep[2][2];
	ll last[2][1];
	public:
	matrix()
	{
		rep[0][0]=2;
		rep[0][1]=3;
		rep[1][0]=1;
		rep[1][1]=0;
		last[0][0]=5;
		last[1][0]=2;
	}
	friend matrix mul(matrix a,matrix b)
	{
		matrix c;
		ll i,j,k;
		for(i=0;i<2;i++)
		{
			for(j=0;j<2;j++)
			{
				c.rep[i][j]=0;
				for(k=0;k<2;k++)
				{
					c.rep[i][j]=(c.rep[i][j]+(a.rep[i][k]*b.rep[k][j])%mod)%mod;
				}
			}
		}
		return c;
	}
	friend matrix fmul(matrix a,matrix b)
	{
		matrix c;
		ll i,j,k;
		for(i=0;i<2;i++)
		{
			for(j=0;j<1;j++)
			{
				c.last[i][j]=0;
				for(k=0;k<2;k++)
				{
					c.last[i][j]=(c.last[i][j]+(a.rep[i][k]*b.last[k][j])%mod)%mod;
				}
			}
		}
		return c;
	}
	friend matrix power(matrix a,ll b)
	{
		if(b==1)
			return  a;
		matrix temp=power(a,b/2);
		temp=mul(temp,temp);
		if(b&1)
			temp=mul(temp,a);
		return temp;
		
	}
	ll get()
	{
		return (last[0][0]);
	}
};
int main()
{
	ll t,n,ans;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		if(n==1)
			printf("5\n");
		else
		{
			n--;
			matrix temp;
			temp=power(temp,n);
			temp=fmul(temp,temp);
			printf("%lld\n",temp.get());
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
